title: True statements about concentric  metal spheres

content.prompt:
Two concentric metal spheres X and Y are shown above. X carries a positive charge, and Y is connected to ground. True statements include which of the following?

I. The electric field inside X is zero.

II. The electric field outside Y is zero.

III. The charge density on both spheres is the same.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
